serial.c File Reference

functions to access the serial port More...

#include <avr/io.h>
#include <avr/interrupt.h>
#include <inttypes.h>
#include "serial.h"
#include "fifo.h"

Functions

 ISR (UDRE_vect)
 interrupt-routine for the Usart-Data-Register-Empty-Interrupt. is called when a byte has been send
 ISR (RX_vect)
 interrupt-routine for the Usart-Receive-Complete-Interrupt. is called when a byte has been send
void serialInit (uint16_t baudrate)
 initialises the serial port
uint8_t serialSendByte (uint8_t b)
 writes a byte (8 Bit) the send-buffer
uint8_t serialSendWord (int16_t w)
 writes a word (16 Bit) to the send-buffer
void serialSendString (const char *str)
 writes a schreibt einen null-terminated string to the send-buffer
int bytesInRcvBuf ()
 returns the number of bytes in the receive buffer
uint8_t serialReadByte ()
 returns the first byte from the receive buffer. Blocks if no data is in the buffer.
uint8_t serialReadLine (char *str, uint16_t length)
 reads a line of the maximum length 'length' from the receive buffer
uint16_t serialNewLines ()
 returns the number of lines in the receive buffer
